title: The Impact of Game-Based Programming Integration on Pre-Service Teachers' Motivation: Design Based on the ARCS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory programming concepts and understanding of game design principles
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where pre-service teachers analyze motivational changes by designing and implementing educational games using MakeCode Arcade in VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can explain game-based learning designs incorporating the four elements of the ARCS model (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction)
Learners can develop educational games applying mathematical concepts using the MakeCode Arcade platform
Learners can quantitatively measure motivational changes during game development and analyze them in connection with the ARCS model
